description: Erection of rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposal has not been consistently depicted on the submitted drawings and would, on the balance of probability, be contrary to B.1(d)(ii) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed side roof slope window would be obscurely glazed and non-opening unless those parts which are openable are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed, contrary to C.2(a) and (b) of Class C, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
